name: oafishness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being stupid, rude, or awkward: He did not defend her against the oafishness of their host. The film manages throughout to make his oafishness endearing. See
oafish
More examplesFewer examplesHis oafishness is perfectly complemented by his clever daughter.Their behaviour springs more from foolishness than oafishness.loud-mouthed drunken oafishness
